name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: An introduction to the field of Computer Science, providing a basic understanding of computer systems, programming, and algorithms.

name: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: A course introducing several common data structures and algorithms, and their use in software development.

name: Programming Languages
description: A course introducing the basics of programming languages, including syntax, semantics, and common features.

name: Advanced Programming Languages
description: A course introducing advanced features of programming languages, including type systems, type inference, and functional programming.
